title: Can't Open Universe of League of Legends Site
body:
http://www.imgim.com/asaaasasa.jpg

Changing region does not help. 404 error. I dont have any problem in my phone. Why is that?

replies.body: There may be a cache or connection problem with your PC that's failing to load that page properly.  Try [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) as your first step, running as Incognito, or another browser entirely.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gaEELtbE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T21:49:53.040+0000)
>
> There may be a cache or connection problem with your PC that's failing to load that page properly.  Try [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) as your first step, running as Incognito, or another browser entirely.  Hope that helps!

Sadly it did not help. I have no idea why I have this problem.
